faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to common questions about our pricing

questions.question: Can I change plans later?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes to your subscription will be prorated based on the time remaining in your billing cycle.

questions.question: Is there a free trial?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for all company plans. Developers can use the basic plan for free indefinitely.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for annual plans. We do not accept cryptocurrency at this time.

questions.question: Can I get a refund?
questions.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all plans. If you're not satisfied with our service, contact our support team within 30 days of your purchase for a full refund.

questions.question: Do you offer discounts?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer discounts for annual billing (save 20%) and for startups, non-profits, and educational institutions. Contact our sales team for more information.

questions.question: What happens when I reach my job posting limit?
questions.answer: When you reach your job posting limit, you can either upgrade to a higher plan or purchase additional job postings as needed. We offer flexible options to accommodate your hiring needs.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.subtitle: Our team is here to help. Contact us for more information about our pricing or to discuss custom plans for your specific needs.
